WITH DEPARTMENT_AUTH AS ( SELECT DEP_ID ,DEP_NAME ,DESCRIPTION ,PARENT_DEP FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.DEPARTMENT ) ,ALL_DEPARTMENT_SORT (FUNCTION_LEVEL, DEP_ID, DEP_NAME, DESCRIPTION, PARENT_DEP) AS ( SELECT CAST(1 AS VARCHAR) AS FUNCTION_LEVEL, CAST(b.DEP_ID AS VARCHAR), CAST(b.DEP_NAME AS VARCHAR), CAST(b.DESCRIPTION AS VARCHAR), CAST(b.PARENT_DEP AS VARCHAR) FROM DEPARTMENT_AUTH b WHERE b.PARENT_DEP IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT CAST(PARENT.FUNCTION_LEVEL + 1 AS VARCHAR), CAST(CHILD.DEP_ID AS VARCHAR), CAST(CHILD.DEP_NAME AS VARCHAR), CAST(CHILD.DESCRIPTION AS VARCHAR), CAST(CHILD.PARENT_DEP AS VARCHAR) FROM DEPARTMENT_AUTH AS CHILD JOIN ALL_DEPARTMENT_SORT PARENT ON CHILD.PARENT_DEP = PARENT.DEP_ID ) SELECT d.DEP_ID ,d.DEP_NAME ,d.DESCRIPTION ,d.PARENT_DEP FROM ALL_DEPARTMENT_SORT d ORDER BY DEP_ID
SELECT d.DEP_ID ,d.DEP_NAME ,d.DESCRIPTION ,d.PARENT_DEP FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.DEPARTMENT d ORDER BY d.DEP_ID

SELECT DEP_ID ,DEP_NAME ,DESCRIPTION ,PARENT_DEP FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.DEPARTMENT WHERE PARENT_DEP IS NOT NULL
AND DEP_ID IN ( SELECT DEP_ID FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.USER_DEPARTMENT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} )
ORDER BY DEP_ID
